name: One Shall Rise: JAM
description:
One Shall Rise: JAM

This game is a demo of a metroidvania concept I'm working with.

the final version will introduce combat, more game mechanics, and a world over 1000 screens large.

This game aims to capture what it's like to live in a world where you need to adapt and evolve to overcome difficulties.

Please let me know if you find a bug and I'll fix it in a jiffy.
